name: A Thousand Dormant Machines (whilefun)
description:
Made for Wizard Jam 8, named for Important If True episode 4.

You must build a manufacturing line to yield a pallet of Regular Chocolate Bars. Use the tutorial and machine spec data to combine machines and conveyors together to create a manufacturing line that produces Regular Chocolate Bars.

Controls

Right Mouse: Rotate Camera

Middle Mouse (Scroll): Zoom in/out
Middle Mouse (Click+Drag): Pan Camera
WASD/Arrows: Pan Camera
Left Mouse: Use Current Tool, Interact with UI
Tab: Auto-select Conveyor machine
1: Switch to Build Tool
2: Switch to Select Tool
Delete: Delete selected machine
Escape: Pause Menu
R: Show Recipe Guide
